question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. projector
B. man in yellow
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The man in yellow is visible on the far side of the room, behind the projector which is mounted on the ceiling closer to the viewer, making him clearly further away in 3D space.
